action.content:
You’re guiding me through Mapworld to reach an Escape Room. I don’t know what it looks like, but you have its image.

First, describe your image in this format and nothing else:
DESCRIPTION: your description of the image

Whenever I ask a question, answer based only on your image in this format and nothing else:
ANSWER: your answer
action.label: context

action.content:
DESCRIPTION: The image shows a cluttered garage with various items. There are bicycles, a workbench, storage bins, and shelves with tools and supplies. Clothes are hanging on a rod, and a hat is on a shelf. The space is filled with miscellaneous objects, including a ladder and a trash can.

ANSWER: The image shows a cluttered garage with various items. There are bicycles, a workbench, storage bins, and shelves with tools and supplies. Clothes are hanging on a rod
action.label: response

answer: the image shows a cluttered garage with various items. there are bicycles, a workbench, storage bins, and shelves with tools and supplies. clothes are hanging on a rod

ESCAPE

Do not generate any additional text.
